Instance.description: An interaction in which a Sim will collect all objects of the same time and simulate holding them in a stack. When picked up, the objects will be set to transient, and if it doesn't already exist, a 'stack' object will be added to the world as the new carry target.

TunableVariant.name: aggregate_object
TunableVariant.description: The type of object to use as the aggregate object. If a definition is specified, the aggregate object will be created using that definition. If 'interaction_target' is specified, the aggregate object will be created using the definition of the interaction target.

TunableList.name: definitions
TunableList.description: A list of object definitions. One of them will be chosen randomly and created as part of this interaction to represent the many collected objects the participant has picked up.

TunableEnum.name: aggregate_object_owner
TunableEnum.description: Specify the owner of the newly created aggregate object.

Tunable.name: destroy_original_object
Tunable.description: If checked, the original object (the target of this interaction), will be destroyed and replaced with the specified aggregate object. If unchecked, the aggregate object will be created in the Sim's hand, but the original object will not be destroyed.
